p: Two Korean patents describe the use of RNA aptamers for inhibition of SARS viruses. Patent application KR2009128837 identifies RNA aptamers as anti-SARS agents capable of binding to and inhibiting the double-stranded DNA unwinding of the SARS virus helicase. Related patent application KR 2012139512 describes RNA aptamers with distinct affinity for the nucleocapsid of SARS-CoV for potential pharmaceutical use.
